name: Galaxy Writing Desk
description: The Galaxy Writing Desk is a classic and sculptural piece with its beautifully shaped legs. Handmade with an Antique Natural Shagreen surface and bronze-patina brass legs, this desk embodies whimsical elements and is not afraid to be daring and unexpected in design. Inspired by galactic constellations, the inlay patterns of shagreen and shells are truly one-of-a-kind.
